name: The Tick
overview: As The Tick, you have powers and abilities unknown to mortal men (After all, you are a 7 foot tall, 400 pound Arachnid). You're strong enough to use the city as your personal gym without a care in the world... until those pesky ninjas, hoods and clowns pick you as their target. It's time to jump into action and destroy these bad guys once and for all!
